meanings.definition: The branch of medicine concerned with the treatment of disease and the action of remedial agents.
meanings.sent1: The doctor specialized in therapeutics to help patients get better.
meanings.sent2: She studied therapeutics to learn how to treat different illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit about therapeutics had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her caring nature was the best therapeutics for his broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The power of therapeutics lies in its ability to heal and restore health.

meanings.definition: The treatment of disease or disorders by remedial agents or methods.
meanings.sent1: His research focused on finding new therapeutics for cancer patients.
meanings.sent2: The hospital offered various therapeutics to improve patient outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The idea of using ice cream as therapeutics seemed strange but effective.
meanings.sent4: Laughter can be a powerful therapeutics for a gloomy mood.
meanings.sent5: In times of need, the right therapeutics can make all the difference in recovery.
